ai-ja277:1.2_0: like a gourd on a hill,
ai-ja277:1.4_0: And my worms will go about.
ai-ja277:2.1_0: now we do woven about the sovereignty!
ai-ja277:2.3_0: they think I am not like this,
ai-ja277:3.2_0: We have no thought of this.
ai-ja277:3.3_0: however people are pleased with their mind,
ai-ja277:3.4_0: due to that life of purity.”
ai-ja277:4.1_0: The seventh section for recitation on customs.
